text: nowpel del puokke( kaun ) ban niyeay tha pitabrakd nasa you so hv ning baaunobrosa robsa ke( poun yea min)cheatisrleanh robsa aupouk yeung cheang puok yeung tohbei puok yeung chea krom del khlang kla kadaoy . pitabrakd nasa aupouk robsa puok yeung chea anak del sthet knong pheap lomieng yeang chbasaleasa
